summary: Jefferson Airplane was an American rock band from San Francisco, formed in 1965. They were one of the first psychedelic rock bands and were very popular during the 1960s. Their album *Surrealistic Pillow* (1967) was a big success and included famous songs like "Somebody to Love" and "White Rabbit." The band played at many important music festivals and was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1996. Over time, the band members went their separate ways, with some forming new groups, but Jefferson Airplane's music remains influential.
title: Jefferson Airplane
